Key Match Events: Will Benson hit a three-run home run in the bottom of the seventh inning
Post-Match Reflections: Fernando Cruz: 'We lost it together. It’s nobody’s fault'
Emilio Pagán: 'I made, in my opinion, an inexcusable mistake'
Pagán: 'Obviously, we’re battling basically for our playoff lives'
Miscellaneous Highlights: Lawrence Butler hit a home run in the first inning
Benson's home run was his first since July 29 and his 13th of the season
Others: The Reds dropped to a 63-70 record and 10 games back for the final National League Wild Card spot
The Reds have lost nine of their last 12 games
